name: calling Yarak
description:
An evil wizard named Yarak has taken over our world by turning life-sized dolls into human soldiers.
The last hope for mankind is a soldier called main character, who has unnatural powers and inhuman strength. In our game, Calling Yarak, main character will travel from island to island to get rid of Yaraks magical soldiers and get closer to the root of the problem - Yarak.🧙‍♂️
This game will excite players with fun player abilities, overexaggerated and humorous effects. Made by Unitystid

Any feedback is welcome!!!

Controls:

  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to aim in
  • G to throw sheep
  • Space to jump
  • I to skip cutscene
  • I to return to main menu
